choices: Photography has not always been a readily accepted art form.
Photography is used for many different purposes.
Photographers and artists have the same principal aims.
Photographers today are more creative than those of the past.

question: What is the writerâ€™s main point?

text: This may seem a pointless question today. Surrounded as we are by thousands of photographs, most of us take for granted that, in addition to supplying information and seducing customers, camera images also serve as decoration, afford spiritual enrichment, and provide significant insights into the passing scene. But in the decades following the discovery of photography, this question reflected the search for ways to fit the mechanical medium into the traditional schemes of artistic expression.
